subject: Re: Daily use
msgSnippet: Same as me :-). Currently I m learning the Groote stenography abbreviations which are perfect for use in Senior Quikscript. Also, I m looking to use the same
messageBody:
Same as me :-). Currently I'm learning the Groote stenography
abbreviations which are perfect for use in Senior Quikscript. Also,
I'm looking to use the same abbreviation rules to abbreviate other
words.

Ramses

--- In Read_Alphabet@yahoogroups.com, "steveb_667" <sbartok1632@...>
wrote:
>
> 1). I use Quikscript about 1-2 hours a day.
>
> 2). Yes, daily.
>
> 3). For personal writings, Senior QS with only some of the
> connectivity. For the website, I restrict myself to the 40 basic
> letters but use some expanded abbreviations & most of the Senior QS
> spelling rules.
>
> --- In Read_Alphabet@yahoogroups.com, "Ramses Oudt" <tommie22@>
wrote:
> >
> > When do you use Quikscript? Do you use it daily or only when you
> > really, really need to? Also; what form of Quikscript do you
write and
> > do you use any abbreviations (if so, for how many words?)?
> >
>
